Putting chemical weapons into perspective

Feb 23, 2003

Here in the United States, an unsexy virus not much associated with evil or terrorism — influenza — claims between 10,000 and 20,000 lives per year; smallpox hasn’t taken a life since the 1970s.

From the American Prospect online.
